edge: Becca is intrigued by Edward's mysterious and aloof behavior during their biology class. Later, they kiss passionately in her room.
Becca confronts Edward and thinks that he is one of the Jonas Brothers.
Becca moves to Sporks to live with her father after her mother starts an affair with Tiger Woods.
The real perpetrators of the killing spree are a group of vampires usually mistaken for the Black Eyed Peas.
Becca quickly befriends Jennifer at her new high school in Sporks.
Becca agrees to go to prom with Edward
Later, Becca and Edward kiss passionately in her room
Edward introduces her to his vampire family
While unwrapping a gift, Becca gets a paper cut
Jeremiah attempts to bite her
To keep his family away from Becca, Edward distracts them and takes her out to the woods
Becca is heartbroken for months after Edward's departure
Deepening friendship with her childhood friend Jacob White comforts Becca
Becca is accosted by three nomadic vampires again
Jacob transforms into a Chihuahua as his werewolf pack arrives to save her
Edward is now dating Lady Gaga to get over losing Becca
Edward decides to provoke the 'Zolturi', a powerful and narcissistic vampire coven, into killing him by exposing himself in the sunlight in front of humans
Iris arrives at Becca's house and tells her that she has to save

Becca's survival is another vision for the character leaving, but she is unable to warn him. Later, Iris arrives and informs Becca that she needs to save Edward by showing him that she is still alive, as the Zolturi are currently partying at the prom due to the St. Salvatore theme. However, Jacob appears and demands that Becca choose between him and Edward before she announces her decision, but he is distracted by a cat and runs off to chase it.
Upon arriving at the prom, Becca is caught between the warring factions of Edward fangirls and Jacob fangirls. She is unable to reach Edward before he exposes himself, figuratively and literally.
Twilight occurs as Becca gets Edward to safety during the mid-credits scene after Frank leaves, thinking that supernatural creatures are the prom theme.
A new moon and an eclipse conceal Edward's vampiric nature during Becca's mission to save him at the prom.
Edward is forced to turn Becca into a vampire, at risk of being killed horribly as a condition for their marriage.
